revision.text:
{{Wad | name = LightMaze | author = [[User talk:Lightning|Lightning]] | iwad = Doom2 | status = Unreleased | link = N/A }}
== Description ==
'''LightMaze''' is a teamwork oriented coop mod based on JumpMaze created by [[User talk:Lightning|Lightning]]. You jump through the levels meeting new monsters, bosses and traps. To pass some of the traps, you must have 2 players or more, meaning it can not be played in single player mode.
In order to download the mod e-mail: ''lightning68340@live.com''
Or contact me on the '''ZDoom Forums'''.
